runs.comm: full on leg and swept fine, the throw is fired in as they rush through for the single and Amla is just home as Baz backhands it onto the stumps
worked to Guptill on the leg side and he misfields to allow them a single
full on leg and clipped to midwicket
well well, Levi gets down to sweep, completely top edges it and amazingly it carries well over fine leg's head and over the rope, that was not struck well at all
fires this into the pads and the ball somehow squeezes through the gap between pad and leg stump, Levi was beaten all ends up there
gets forward and defends to midwicket
full on middle and leg and clipped away behind square
poor ball down leg and Levi gets on the front foot and flicks it away with far more power than his demeanour suggested and it went high into the stands at backward square
outside off and Levi is beaten as tries to pull
banged in short on middle and Levi this time plays with authority as he powerfully pulls it in between the stands at backward square
poor bowling from Bracewell, full on leg and Levi flicks it away again, the only saving grace for the bowler is that this is hit along the ground so he only concedes four
played into the off side to end a productive over for South Africa
Amla has miscalculated there, goes for a needless loft to a full ball outside off, slices it high down to Franklin at long-off who takes a simple catch
fired into middle at 102kph and he defends to leg
poor there from the bowler, fired down leg past both the flick by Levi and the gloves of Baz and it runs off to the fence

well well, flicks a full ball towards mid-on who fumbles, they run on the misfield and the fielder fires in a flat throw to Nathan McCullum at the bowler's end who takes the bails off. Levi is in by the smallest of margins, but he only stays after initially being given out on the screen within two seconds of the throw! Echoes of Bruce Oxenford over in Brisbane
gets forward and defends to cover
goes back and cuts nicely but picks out point
plays a handsome loft over the covers and to the boundary, well played by the pinch-hitter
full outside off and Levi heaves across the line through wide mid-on and it races away
bangs in the bouncer outside off and Levi sways easily out of harm's way
again short outside off and this time Levi tries to pull but can't connect, Southee is quick to have a few words as the War of Wellington continues
full toss which swung in late, squeezed out to long-on
good length ball outside off which beats Parnell's attempted steer through third man
punches a full ball outside off straight to point
gets this to pitch on middle and turns down leg, hits Levi on the pad as he tries to sweep, rolls away

tossed up wide outside off and spinning away, Parnell tried to swing across the line and had to reach for it, missed and overbalanced out of the crease while doing so, Baz whips the bails off with Parnell well out as he tries to get back in
AB gets forward and punches his first ball towards long-on
terrible ball miles down leg which Baz can't collect cleanly, they run a wide in addition to the compulsory extra
in the slot outside off and Levi smacks it over the long-off boundary and clocks a TV worker on the back of the head as he tries to evade the ball whizzing at him
punches off the back foot to point
gets a thick edge to a ball on middle as he backed away and tried to force through the covers, goes straight through where a first slip would have been down to third man
defends with soft hands into the off side and they set off quickly

that is a ludicrously good stroke, it is a short ball aimed at his head at good pace, Levi is on the front foot and goes through with a short-arm pull and sends the ball packing over the midwicket boundary
short outside off and Levi again tries to pull to leg and misses
and is dispatched first ball, Levi puts the front foot down and lofts cleanly straight over the bowler's head over the team dugouts
tosses it up on leg and beats Levi, hit on the pad on leg
hoists a short ball away into the deep at midwicket
pushed through down leg and clipped away to deep square
drives a full ball outside off down the ground to bring up an outstanding 50 from only 25 balls, he has given South Africa a quality start
gets forward and defends to off
pulled away into the leg side
short outside off and cuts to the right of point on the circle's edge

doesn't time this well at all, probably a top edge, but Levi has the power of Os du Randt in the South African rugby team's scrum and he just heaves a short ball outside off over the long-on fence with very little timing
chips this ball outside off three-quarters of the way to the cover boundary as the deep fielder runs in to collect
outside off and AB neatly gets over it and steers it down to third man
starts with a gentle ball on leg which AB tucks away
only 112kph and full on the pads, worked to long-on
goes back and whips off the back foot out to long-on
full outside off and squeezed it towards cover
clips a ball on the pads nice and fine and the fielder has to exercise his lungs
full on off and digs it out to long-off
wide outside off and he slashes it in the air down to the third man fence, South Africa doing this easy
full on middle and it is slow at 110kph, played back to Mills
outside off and AB calmly steers it to third man
short slower ball outside off at 114kph but Levi spots it early and flatbats it over long-off with ease
smacks a full ball outside off past a diving cover and it races to the fence, Levi is looking for a hundred here
pulls away a short ball on off to deep midwicket
fired into leg and jammed back to Hira
flicks a full ball on leg through towards long-on
plays it to off
fired in well down leg and AB lets it go
comes down and works it to wide long-on
fired into middle and Levi crunches it towards cover where Guptill dives brilliantly to cut it off
Levi doesn't quite get underneath this ball but nevertheless hits his ninth six tonight, hit flat towards long-off where Franklin dived but couldn't get a hand to it as it went over his head
AB calmly plays to long-on, he too wants to watch the Levi show
and you can see why, Levi's sixes are into double digits, hits a ball outside off flat down the ground and into the sightscreen
that is a record, the most sixes ever in a Twenty20 International innings, pulls a short ball on middle and off with impunity over the square leg boundary
fired into the pads and it hits them, rolls away
short on middle and off, AB guides it down through the slips
that's a dozen!! 12th six for Levi, full outside off and Levi slams it over the boundary with ease, absolutely smashed that, who wants to bowl to him?
Hira fires it into AB, who is forward to defend
flicks a ball on leg away through square, brings Levi on strike, will he try to get the 100 with a boundary?
full outside leg, Levi sweeps well but picks out deep backward square
full on the stumps and he defends
comes down the track and is hit on the pad trying to defend
skews a drive off the outer edge to backward point
full outside off and he drives through the covers into the deep, they rush back for a couple

there it is, the fastest ever Twenty20 International hundred from Richard Levi! What a maiden hundred to make for your country, drove a full ball outside off into the deep and shrieked in delight, kissed the badge and beamed a grin as wide as the Southern Ocean
waist high full toss down leg and AB can't catch up with it trying to pull, 100 partnership up in 55 balls
clips a full ball on leg into the deep where the fielder puts it in a superb effort on the fence to cut it off
full on the pads and clipped away through backward square and this time the fielder can't cut it off
full on the stumps, comes down and works to midwicket
comes down the track and drills it to long-off
backs away and slaps past the bowler towards long-off
Levi decides he hasn't hit enough fours tonight, so gets down on a knee and sweeps it through midwicket and out to the fence
backs away well outside leg and cuts into the deep
drives a full ball outside off into the covers
Levi hits the ball into Seddon Road, glad my car isn't parked there, he came down and launched this over wide long-on past the Northern Districts offices and out of the ground
smears a ball on leg into the deep at backward square
full on middle and leg and worked away into the deep
fired in down leg and Levi is beaten, but New Zealand are the ones who are already well and truly beaten
gets some luck as he inside edges his nemesis Southee pat the stumps and down to fine leg
worked to deep backward square
AB hits the winning runs with a right royal thump over the top of mid-on and wide of the long-on fielder, what a hiding South Africa have handed out to the hosts tonight
